About

Skills Section

Hello, I'm Eric, a passionate and dedicated student specializing in Cross-Platform Application Development. With a strong foundation in both web development and machine learning, I am constantly exploring and adopting new technologies to enhance my skill set. I thrive on the challenge of creating efficient, scalable, and user-friendly applications, and I am committed to continuously refining my abilities through hands-on projects.

Although I am currently pursuing my formal education, I am also an avid self-learner, constantly seeking to expand my knowledge and skills beyond the classroom. This dual approach allows me to stay ahead of the curve and adapt to the ever-changing tech landscape.

In my free time, I enjoy engaging in video games and cinema, activities that fuel my creativity and help me maintain a healthy balance between my professional and personal life. I am also a huge animal lover, and I take great joy in helping animals I find on the streets by finding them a loving home. I have two cats, Loki and Wanda, who are a big part of my life.
